Package com.TheBigAdventure.characterEntities

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
com.TheBigAdventure.characterEntities.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
CanFight, Character
public final class Enemy extends Object implements Character, CanFight
Represents an enemy character in the game.
